about_the_game:
Laugh so hard that it hurts

This game will make you laugh so hard that it hurts.

Variety

Elegant farts. Nasty farts. Savage farts. Animals fart. People fart. Everybody farts.

Think you know farts?

You will see a picture of a person or animal. You guess how they will fart. Don't worry if you get it wrong, trying again is fun.

Wholesome family fun

Call grandma and get the whole family together and answer the question, "How they fart?"

Achievements

Lots of Steam achievements to unlock. It's easy.

Is your friend a robot?

If you think your friend might be a robot, have them play this game. If they don't laugh even a little, they are likely a robot.

Feel Good

Nice, pretty, soft, pleasingly colorful colors scientifically designed to make you feel happy and peaceful, along with outrageous farts and hilarious laughter to make you feel really, really stupidly happy.

DEVELOPED USING THE LATEST TECHNOLOGIES IN UNREAL ENGINE 5

legal_notice: How They Fart is a work of satirical fiction.
name: How They Fart?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster (e.g., Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Determine your Fart Intelligence (FI) in this outrageously fun satire game. You will see images of people or animals, then you guess how they fart. You will laugh so hard that it hurts. Wholesome fun for any age.
